item.description: 第二次作业 1分12秒=72000毫秒 (7A)13=(101)10 (7A)16=(122)10 (7A)16=(01111010)2=(712)8 (1011011)2=(133)8=(513)16 (678)10=(1010100110)2=(1246)8 (111)2+(101)2=(1100)2 Information: Information is that which informs. Postional notation:positional notation or place-value notation is a method of representation or encoding numbers. Algorithm:an algorithm is an effective method that can be expressed within a finite amount of space and time and in a well-defined formal language for calculating a function. Software bug:A software bug is an error,flaw,failure or fault in computer program or system that causes it to produce an incorrect or unexpected result,or to behave in unintended ways.
